languages.text: "Кому тут и стенать, так это душам почтенных мертвецов, что терпят соседство ксеносской дохлятины".
languages.translation_comment:
Having found and identified a xenos tomb at the dynastic crypt.
Yrliet: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

traits.locale_text: "Кому тут и стенать, так это душам почтенных мертвецов, что терпят соседство ксеносской дохлятины".

languages.text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."
languages.translation_comment:
Having found and identified a xenos tomb at the dynastic crypt.
Yrliet: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"
languages.original_text: "Кому тут и стенать, так это душам почтенных мертвецов, что терпят соседство ксеносской дохлятины".

traits.locale_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."
"The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

"The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

languages.text: 「叫ぶべきなのは、異種族の腐肉と一緒にされるのを強いられている、誉れ高き死者の魂の方だろう」
languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

traits.locale_text: 「叫ぶべきなのは、異種族の腐肉と一緒にされるのを強いられている、誉れ高き死者の魂の方だろう」

languages.text: "Weinen sollten die Seelen der ehrenwerten Toten, die gezwungen sind, die Gesellschaft von Xenos-Aas zu erdulden."
languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

traits.locale_text: "Weinen sollten die Seelen der ehrenwerten Toten, die gezwungen sind, die Gesellschaft von Xenos-Aas zu erdulden."

languages.text: « Les âmes qui doivent pleurer sont celles des morts honorables qui sont forcés de tolérer la compagnie de charognes xénos. »
languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

traits.locale_text: « Les âmes qui doivent pleurer sont celles des morts honorables qui sont forcés de tolérer la compagnie de charognes xénos. »

languages.text: «Las que deberían gemir son las almas de los honorables difuntos que se ven obligadas a tolerar la presencia de carroña xenos».
languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

traits.locale_text: «Las que deberían gemir son las almas de los honorables difuntos que se ven obligadas a tolerar la presencia de carroña xenos».

languages.text: “该呼喊的是那些死者的灵魂，他们不得不忍受异形腐肉作伴。”
languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

traits.locale_text: “该呼喊的是那些死者的灵魂，他们不得不忍受异形腐肉作伴。”

languages.text: "Asıl leşçil zenolara göz yummak zorunda bırakılan, onurlarıyla can veren ruhlar haykırmalı."
languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."

traits.locale_text: "Asıl zeno leşçillerine göz yummak zorunda bırakılan, onurlarıyla can veren ruhlar haykırmalı."

languages.original_text: "The ones crying should be the souls of the honoured dead who are forced to tolerate the company of xenos carrion."
